name: Letter A
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="bubblyAGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,50,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="shineAGrad" cx="30%" cy="30%" r="70%" fx="30%" fy="30%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0.8);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 150 400 L 256 100 L 362 400 L 330 400 L 300 300 L 212 300 L 182 400 Z" fill="url(#bubblyAGrad)" stroke="#9C2C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 256 100 C 200 150, 200 150, 150 400 Z" fill="url(#shineAGrad)" opacity="0.6" />
  <path d="M 212 300 L 300 300" stroke="#8B0000" stroke-width="10" />
</svg>
